Articles.Content:
Am I the only one who can't switch back to the current space craft after viewing a planet? I've tried using double click as well as the brackets.

Edited September 4, 2013 by Djsnowboy267
It happens to me too, Just press TAB until you focus on Eeloo then press it once more so you focus it on your Spacecraft.
It says on the Wiki that Backspace will reset your focus in mapview.
Ah, so is it tab? I thought it was brackets, like switching ships. I will try when I get home.
Those both worked, thanks. I feel stupid for not knowing this before.
Thanks for posting it. =P I didn't know either.
